attributes.action: Ban the sale of quad bikes (and similar vehicles) and vehicles designated for 'off road use only"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the completely avoidable death of 7 yr old Elizabeth Cooke whilst illegally riding a quad bike on the public highway it is time that this type of vehicle is banned from sale in the UK unless there is a business need (eg: farmers accessing their land) - other items banned shd include 'mini-moto' motorbikes and go-ped's. Existing vehicles shd be made to comply with road vehicle legislation (number plates; lights; MoT Test; insurance; VED etc)  - failure to comply wld result in in the vehicle being destroyed by the Police
